column2: UV& do you copy me? I see you are going to @Lomnický štít Observatory|.%Great! This observatory has been monitoring the behavior of the @solar corona| for more than 60 years.
column3: UV& do you copy me? I see you are going to Lomnický štít Observatory.%Great!This observatory has been monitoring the behavior of the solar corona for more than 60 years.
column4: UV& do you copy me? I see you are going to @Lomnický štít Observatory|.%Great! This observatory has been monitoring the behavior of the @solar corona| for more than 60 years.

column2: We need you to observe the corona to obtain more information about what is happening on the Sun!%And don't forget to test the new camera for EST... It will allow us to study the Sun in @different wavelengths| with a resolution never achieved before.
column3: We need you to observe the corona to obtain more information about what is happening on the Sun!%And don't forget to test the new camera for EST... It will allow us to study the Sun in different wavelengths with a resolution never achieved before.
column4: We need you to observe the corona to obtain more information about what is happening on the Sun!%And don't forget to test the new camera for EST... It will allow us to study the Sun in @different wavelengths| with a resolution never achieved before.

column2: But& be careful... Strange things are happening ...%Good luck! (You will need it).
column3: But& be careful... Strange things are happening ...%Good luck! (You will need it).
column4: But& be careful... Strange things are happening ...%Good luck! (You will need it).

column2: Congratulations!%You now have the power of generating @$solar magnetic tornadoes$|!
column3: Congratulations!%You now have the power of generating $solar magnetic tornadoes$!
column4: Congratulations!%You now have the power of generating @$solar magnetic tornadoes$|!

column2: @Magnetic tornadoes| are plasma structures rotating in the solar atmosphere.%They can reach velocities of more than 10000 kilometers per hour.%This ability will help you accomplish your mission!
column3: Magnetic tornadoes are plasma structures rotating in the solar atmosphere.%They can reach velocities of more than 10000 kilometers per hour.%This ability will help you accomplish your mission!
column4: @Magnetic tornadoes| are plasma structures rotating in the solar atmosphere.%They can reach velocities of more than 10000 kilometers per hour.%This ability will help you accomplish your mission!

column2: @Auroras|! What??!!%They occur when particles launched from the Sun collide with the @Earth's magnetic field|. It's rare to see them at these low latitudes... and in daylight!
column3: Auroras! What??!!%They occur when particles launched from the Sun collide with the Earth's magnetic field. It's rare to see them at these low latitudes... and in daylight!
column4: @Auroras|! What??!!%They occur when particles launched from the Sun collide with the @Earth's magnetic field|. It's rare to see them at these low latitudes... and in daylight!

column3: Flare!%Are you already close to the Einstein Tower?%Great!
column4: Flare!%Are you already close to the @Einstein Tower|?%Great!

column2: Did you know that it was the first solar tower built in Europe?%I still remember when we laid the first brick.%I was a young man with a mane flowing in the wind...

column4: Did you know that it was the first solar tower built in Europe?%I still remember when we laid the first brick.%I was a young man with a mane flowing in the wind...

column4: @EST| will decompose and analyze the light using spectropolarimeters.%Good luck!

column2: Those crazy machines aren't going to make things easy for us...%That's why we've outfitted you with our latest invention: a miniature @coronal mass ejection cannon|. It is the pocket version of one of the most energetic events in the Solar System!
column3: Those crazy machines aren't going to make things easy for us...%That's why we've outfitted you with our latest invention: a miniature Coronal Mass Ejection cannon. It is the pocket version of one of the most energetic events in the Solar System!

column4: Oh no!%The @solar storm| has damaged the mechanism that opens the barrier.

column4: The barrier works with solar energy... try using your cannon to activate it.%But without blowing it up!

column4: Look! A @beam splitter|!%This optical device splits the light into different rays& each with a different polarisation. I'll give it a try!

column4: Hurry up!%The laboratory is in the basement.%You have to go in there and get the @spectropolarimeter|.

column4: The instruments are fed with sunlight from the dome.%Go up and move the @coelostat| to send the light beam to the basement.

column4: Walk up the tower and open the dome.%The air will cool the telescope& avoiding image distortions!

column3: Well done& Spectro.%Now& switch on the air systems that keep the primary and the secondary mirrors cool!
column4: Well done& Spectro.%Now& switch on the air systems that keep the @primary and the secondary mirrors| cool!

column2: On my way!%(Too many stairs... I think that I won't renew my gym subscription this month)

column2: You are fit as a fiddle& Spectro!%Now& we need you to refill the coolant of the @M3-M6 mirrors system|.

column4: You are fit as a fiddle& Spectro!%Now& we need you to refill the coolant of the @M3-M6 mirrors system|.

column2: Sure!
column3: Sure!
column4: Sure!

column2: We are almost done! But heating is not the only problem.%Please& calibrate the @adaptive optics| system to correct the distorsions caused by Earth's atmosphere.
column3: We are almost done! But heating is not the only problem.%Please& calibrate the adaptive optics system to correct the distorsions caused by Earth's atmosphere.
column4: We are almost done! But heating is not the only problem.%Please& calibrate the @adaptive optics| system to correct the distorsions caused by Earth's atmosphere.

column2: It sounds easy if you don't have a giant robot attacking you& right...?

column4: It sounds easy if you don't have a giant robot attacking you& right...?

column2: And last& but not least& activate the @heat rejecter| to avoid excessive heating from the sunlight!
column3: And last& but not least& activate the heat rejecter to avoid excessive heating from the sunlight!
column4: And last& but not least& activate the @heat rejecter| to avoid excessive heating from the sunlight!
